issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: When federated regions are configured global IAM identifiers such as account aliases and X.509 certificate identifiers should be checked for uniqueness against all other regions. Currently only a majority of regions are checked which can result in duplicates when there are > 2 regions.
fields.summary: IAM does not enforce uniqueness of global names when using federated regions

comments.body:
Fixed.

Eucalyptus Version: {{4.2.0-0.0.24039.713.20151013gite09159a.el6}}

*Steps*

# Set up 3 Eucalyptus 4.2 (4.2.0-0.0.24039.713.20151013gite09159a.el6) clouds with Eucalyptus DNS enabled
#* [hspencer-280|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Maint-4.1/280/] (upgraded from 4.1.2 to 4.2.0)
#* [hspencer-1757|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Master/1757/]
#* [hspencer-1733|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Master/1733/]
# Set up federated cloud using all three regions:
{code}
[root@g-26-03 ~]# cat federated-region-setup.json
{
    "Regions": [
        {
            "CertificateFingerprint": "BB:80:BA:68:93:AB:B6:A5:68:97:5B:D4:A7:A7:C2:D6:F6:09:CF:6C:27:57:86:16:81:1B:1C:E9:02:7D:11:83",
            "CertificateFingerprintDigest": "SHA-256",
            "IdentifierPartitions": [
                1
            ],
            "Name": "future",
            "Services": [
                {
                    "Endpoints": [
                        "http://identity.c-09.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/"
                    ],
                    "Type": "identity"
                },
                {
                    "Endpoints": [
                        "http://compute.c-09.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/"
                    ],
                    "Type": "compute"
                }
            ]
        },
        {
            "CertificateFingerprint": "CE:F2:61:C4:55:52:60:CE:DD:D5:41:17:35:C2:45:B5:5A:A9:37:19:2C:3C:EA:7A:8B:17:26:21:39:DF:45:98",
            "CertificateFingerprintDigest": "SHA-256",
            "IdentifierPartitions": [
                2
            ],
            "Name": "dead-prez",
            "Services": [
                {
                    "Endpoints": [
                        "http://identity.e-05.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/"
                    ],
                    "Type": "identity"
                },
                {
                    "Endpoints": [
                        "http://compute.e-05.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/"
                    ],
                    "Type": "compute"
                }
            ]
        },
        {
            "CertificateFingerprint": "9E:60:A4:04:FC:24:69:CC:C9:F3:46:60:4D:37:52:15:E2:AE:88:B0:4F:58:08:88:13:5C:E7:CC:98:C4:C9:FA",
            "CertificateFingerprintDigest": "SHA-256",
            "IdentifierPartitions": [
                3
            ],
            "Name": "ghostface-killah",
            "Services": [
                {
                    "Endpoints": [
                        "http://identity.e-41.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/"
                    ],
                    "Type": "identity"
                },
                {
                    "Endpoints": [
                        "http://compute.e-41.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/"
                    ],
                    "Type": "compute"
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}
[root@g-26-03 ~]# euctl region --region euca-admin@future
region.region_enable_ssl = true
region.region_name = future
region.region_ssl_ciphers = RSA:DSS:ECDSA:TLS_EMPTY_RENEGOTIATION_INFO_SCSV:!NULL:!EXPORT:!EXPORT1024:!MD5:!DES:!RC4
region.region_ssl_default_cas = true
region.region_ssl_protocols = TLSv1.2
region.region_ssl_verify_hostnames = false

[root@e-05 ~]# euctl region --region euca-admin@dead-prez
region.region_enable_ssl = true
region.region_name = dead-prez
region.region_ssl_ciphers = RSA:DSS:ECDSA:TLS_EMPTY_RENEGOTIATION_INFO_SCSV:!NULL:!EXPORT:!EXPORT1024:!MD5:!DES:!RC4
region.region_ssl_default_cas = true
region.region_ssl_protocols = TLSv1.2
region.region_ssl_verify_hostnames = false

[root@e-37 ~]# euctl region --region euca-admin@ghostface-killah
region.region_enable_ssl = true
region.region_name = ghostface-killah
region.region_ssl_ciphers = RSA:DSS:ECDSA:TLS_EMPTY_RENEGOTIATION_INFO_SCSV:!NULL:!EXPORT:!EXPORT1024:!MD5:!DES:!RC4
region.region_ssl_default_cas = true
region.region_ssl_protocols = TLSv1.2
region.region_ssl_verify_hostnames = false

[root@g-26-03 ~]# euca-describe-regions --region euca-admin@future
REGION	dead-prez	http://compute.e-05.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
REGION	future	http://compute.c-09.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
REGION	ghostface-killah	http://compute.e-41.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/

[root@e-05 ~]# euca-describe-regions --region euca-admin@dead-prez
REGION	dead-prez	http://compute.e-05.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
REGION	future	http://compute.c-09.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
REGION	ghostface-killah	http://compute.e-41.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/

[root@e-37 ~]# euca-describe-regions --region euca-admin@ghostface-killah
REGION	dead-prez	http://compute.e-05.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
REGION	future	http://compute.c-09.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
REGION	ghostface-killah	http://compute.e-41.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
{code}
# Created 'development-operations' account under 'future' region:
{code}
[root@g-26-03 ~]# euare-accountcreate -w development-operations > .euca/devops-admin.ini --region euca-admin@future

[root@g-26-03 ~]# euare-accountlist --region euca-admin@future
eucalyptus	502181571134
(eucalyptus)imaging	000153229002
(eucalyptus)loadbalancing	000188098072
(eucalyptus)database	000600792605
(eucalyptus)cloudformation	534634454119
development-operations	001827830003
(eucalyptus)objectstorage	000895317970
(eucalyptus)aws-exec-read	916471105907
(eucalyptus)blockstorage	944183563848
engineering	001284021591
{code}
# Tested x509 certificate uniqueness
## Create and upload server certificate
{code}
[root@g-26-03 ~]# openssl genrsa -out devops-elb-pk.pem 2048
[root@g-26-03 ~]# openssl req -sha256 -new -key devops-elb-pk.pem -out devops-elb-csr.pem
[root@g-26-03 ~]# openssl x509 -req -days 365 -in devops-elb-csr.pem -signkey devops-elb-pk.pem -out devops-elb-cert.pem
Signature ok
subject=/C=US/ST=California/L=Goleta/O=Acme Inc/OU=Development Operations/CN=devops-elb.lb.e-05.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
Getting Private key
[root@g-26-03 ~]# euare-servercertupload --certificate-file devops-elb-cert.pem --private-key-file devops-elb-pk.pem devops-elb --region devops-admin@future
{code}
## Confirmed server certificate could be viewed in all regions:
{code}
[root@g-26-03 ~]# euare-servercertlistbypath --region devops-admin@future
arn:aws:iam::001827830003:server-certificate/devops-elb
[root@g-26-03 ~]# euare-servercertlistbypath --region devops-admin@dead-prez
arn:aws:iam::001827830003:server-certificate/devops-elb
[root@g-26-03 ~]# euare-servercertlistbypath --region devops-admin@ghostface-killah
arn:aws:iam::001827830003:server-certificate/devops-elb
{code}
## Attempted to upload server certificate to other regions using the same name:
{code}
[root@g-26-03 ~]# euare-servercertupload --certificate-file devops-elb-cert.pem --private-key-file devops-elb-pk.pem devops-elb --region devops-admin@dead-prez
euare-servercertupload: error (EntityAlreadyExists): Server certificate devops-elb already exists.
[root@g-26-03 ~]# euare-servercertupload --certificate-file devops-elb-cert.pem --private-key-file devops-elb-pk.pem devops-elb --region devops-admin@ghostface-killah
euare-servercertupload: error (EntityAlreadyExists): Server certificate devops-elb already exists.
[root@g-26-03 ~]# euare-servercertupload --certificate-file devops-elb-cert.pem --private-key-file devops-elb-pk.pem devops-elb --region devops-admin@future
euare-servercertupload: error (EntityAlreadyExists): Server certificate devops-elb already exists.
{code}
# Test account alias uniqueness
## Created account alias 'devops'
{code}
[root@g-26-03 ~]# euare-accountlist --region euca-admin@future
eucalyptus	502181571134
(eucalyptus)imaging	000153229002
(eucalyptus)loadbalancing	000188098072
(eucalyptus)database	000600792605
(eucalyptus)cloudformation	534634454119
development-operations	001827830003
(eucalyptus)objectstorage	000895317970
(eucalyptus)aws-exec-read	916471105907
(eucalyptus)blockstorage	944183563848
engineering	001284021591
[root@g-26-03 ~]# euare-accountaliascreate devops --region devops-admin@future
[root@g-26-03 ~]# euare-accountlist --region euca-admin@future
eucalyptus	502181571134
(eucalyptus)imaging	000153229002
(eucalyptus)loadbalancing	000188098072
(eucalyptus)database	000600792605
(eucalyptus)cloudformation	534634454119
devops	001827830003
(eucalyptus)objectstorage	000895317970
(eucalyptus)aws-exec-read	916471105907
(eucalyptus)blockstorage	944183563848
engineering	001284021591
{code}
## Tried to create an account named 'devops' on other regions:
{code}
[root@e-05 ~]# euare-accountlist --region euca-admin@dead-prez
(eucalyptus)objectstorage	000211814505
eucalyptus	000457901909
(eucalyptus)imaging	000077795633
(eucalyptus)loadbalancing	000796003964
(eucalyptus)database	000323465155
(eucalyptus)aws-exec-read	000559754822
(eucalyptus)cloudformation	000834491676
(eucalyptus)blockstorage	000407709640
[root@e-05 ~]# euare-accountcreate devops --region euca-admin@dead-prez
euare-accountcreate: error (EntityAlreadyExists): Account devops already exists.

[root@e-37 ~]# euare-accountlist --region euca-admin@ghostface-killah
(eucalyptus)cloudformation	000963348828
(eucalyptus)objectstorage	000567235152
(eucalyptus)aws-exec-read	000053919114
(eucalyptus)database	000147025799
eucalyptus	000508588944
(eucalyptus)loadbalancing	000473962146
(eucalyptus)imaging	000333573492
(eucalyptus)blockstorage	000647007044
[root@e-37 ~]# euare-accountcreate devops --region euca-admin@ghostface-killah
euare-accountcreate: error (EntityAlreadyExists): Account devops already exists.
{code}
